pr_title: Retry and resubmit certain query failures

timeline.message: Support marking Exception as retryable conditionally

Retry DESCRIBE query failure due to TIME_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

To achieve this, support determining whether a query is retryable
not only by error code, but also other factors such as QueryStage
and error message.

Allow resubmitted errors to be configured

Make PrestoExcepttionClassifier.shouldResubmit an instance method.

Resubmit query for CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY and ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED

CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY on test cluster may happen when the concurrency
on the test cluster is too high given the size of the cluster.

ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED should also be resubmitted at a later time.

Also, improve readability for TestPrestoExceptionClassifier.

Resubmit query for CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY and ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED

timeline.bodyText: Do they have to be public? They're only used in PrestoExceptionClassifier.
timeline.author: yingsu00

replies.bodyText: They are also used in PrestoFacebookExceptionClassifier in presto-facebook/presto-facebook-verifier. Verifier is designed in a way so that components can be extended.
replies.author: caithagoras

timeline.bodyText: nit: The parentheses in (obj == null)  and (getClass() != obj.getClass()) are not needed
timeline.author: yingsu00

timeline.bodyText: I think line 133-139 should belong to the next commit
timeline.author: yingsu00

replies.bodyText:
This commit is refactoring by converting shouldResubmit from a static method to an instance method. The behavior of the function should not change.
Before, this commit, shouldResubmit would return true for certain cases, including  HIVE_PARTITION_DROPPED_DURING_QUERY , HIVE_TABLE_DROPPED_DURING_QUERY, and "table already exists" errors. Line 134 - 139 is only to keep the behavior unchanged for this refactoring.
replies.author: caithagoras

timeline.message:
Retry DESCRIBE query failure due to TIME_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

To achieve this, support determining whether a query is retryable
not only by error code, but also other factors such as QueryStage
and error message.

Make PrestoExceptionClassifier.shouldResubmit an instance method

This allows resubmitted errors to be configured the same way as
retryable errors.

Resubmit query for CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY and ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED

CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY on test cluster may happen when the concurrency
on the test cluster is too high given the size of the cluster.

ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED should also be resubmitted at a later time.

Also, improve readability for TestPrestoExceptionClassifier.

Resubmit query for CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY and ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED

CLUSTER_OUT_OF_MEMORY on test cluster may happen when the concurrency
on the test cluster is too high given the size of the cluster.

ADMINISTRATIVELY_PREEMPTED should also be resubmitted at a later time.

Also, improve readability for TestPrestoExceptionClassifier.
